SMW Subobject for Chemical powderExamine: An acrid chemical.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Ammonium nitrateUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Chemical powder.pngWeight: 0.028Value: 1Version anchor: Chemical powderRelease date: 9 July 2003Item ID: 700

Ammonium nitrate is a quest item. It is used in The Dig Site quest along with nitroglycerin, ground charcoal, and arcenia root to make a chemical compound. It is obtained by using the chest key to open the chest near the panning point, and is brought to the archaeological expert, who identifies it as ammonium nitrate.

Before the archaeological expert identifies it, ammonium nitrate is known as chemical powder.

  • 1 Products
  • 2 Changes
    • 2.1 Gallery (historical)
  • 3 Trivia

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
1 June -
24 November 2004

The chemical powder's inventory sprite was rotated.

Gallery (historical)[edit | edit source]
29 March 2004 –
June-November 2004 		June-November 2004 –
present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Multiple powders can be obtained from the chest if another player opens it. In this case one can save time on obtaining a chest key or using their own.
  • Ammonium nitrate is used in some explosives with nitroglycerin. These are often referred to as ammonium dynamites.
  • Ammonium nitrate is also used as fertiliser.
